response.original_title: スーパーヒロイン危機一髪!! 30: 仮面の女戦士レッドムーン
response.overview: Yayoi Kagerou as the Red-Moon is usually operating an undercover investigation as a female investigator but if there would be evils that cannot be judged by the law, she turns herself into the Red-Moon and beats evils as a sword of righteousness. The Satan is the commander-in-chief of an evil organization named the Satan-Cross， and his tusks give birth to an assassin named Kerberos & Chimaira and are brought into the world and two of them are about to overtake the world. The ambition of the Satan-Cross is spreading a level A kind of a drug called the Madness all over the world and to fall the world into their own hands. The magnificent fights between the Red-Moon and the Satan-Cross are taking place. The Red-Moon is captured and entrapped with cowardly way of the Satan-Cross and she is about to have their hell torture. There is no-sounding screaming of the Red-Moon echoing around.
response.title: Super Heroine in a Close Call!! 30: Masked Woman Soldier Red Moon
